info.name: Smart Clinic API
info.description:
ğŸ¥ Smart Clinic Platform Overview

This platform is a comprehensive healthcare management system designed to streamline patient care, doctor scheduling, and clinic administration. It supports multiple user roles and provides tools for managing appointments, patient records, doctor schedules, and clinic operations.

## ğŸš€ Core System Features

### 1. Multi-Role User System

#### User Types:
â€¢ **Patient**: Can book appointments, view medical profile, update personal information
â€¢ **Doctor**: Can manage schedule, view appointments, access patient profiles
â€¢ **Admin**: Full system management permissions

#### User Data:
â€¢ **Basic Information**: Username, email, first name, last name
â€¢ **Contact Details**: Phone number (Egyptian numbers only - 11 digits)
â€¢ **Personal Data**: Date of birth, gender, address
â€¢ **User Type**: Patient, doctor, or admin

### 2. Doctor Management

#### Doctor Information:
â€¢ **Medical Specialization**: Cardiology, Dermatology, Neurology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, Psychiatry, General, Dental, Eye, Surgery
â€¢ **Professional Data**: License number, years of experience, consultation fee
â€¢ **Biography**: Brief description of doctor's expertise
â€¢ **Clinic**: Associated clinic information

#### Doctor Schedule:
â€¢ **Schedule Management**: Doctors can update working hours for each day
â€¢ **Available Times**: Set start and end times for each day
â€¢ **Availability Status**: Enable/disable doctor availability

### 3. Patient Management

#### Medical Profile:
â€¢ **Medical History**: Previous and current medical conditions
â€¢ **Allergies**: Substances the patient is allergic to
â€¢ **Blood Type**: Patient's blood type
â€¢ **Emergency Contact**: Name and phone number for emergency situations

#### Access Permissions:
â€¢ **Self Access**: Patients can only view and update their own profile
â€¢ **Doctor Access**: Doctors can access all patient profiles
â€¢ **Admin Access**: Admin has full permissions on all profiles

### 4. Appointment System

#### Booking Appointments:
â€¢ **Browse Doctors**: View doctors by specialization
â€¢ **Select Date & Time**: Choose from doctor's available slots
â€¢ **Visit Reason**: Brief description of appointment purpose
â€¢ **Appointment Status**: Pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed, no-show

#### Appointment Management:
â€¢ **For Patients**: View only their own appointments
â€¢ **For Doctors**: View their appointments and update status
â€¢ **For Admin**: Manage all appointments in the system

### 5. Clinic Management

#### Clinic Information:
â€¢ **Basic Data**: Clinic name, address, phone, email
â€¢ **Description**: Brief description of clinic and services
â€¢ **Doctors**: List of doctors working at the clinic

#### Permissions:
â€¢ **Admin Only**: Add, update, delete clinics
â€¢ **Read Access for All**: View clinic information

### 6. Authentication & Security

#### JWT Authentication:
â€¢ **Access Token**: For API access (limited validity)
â€¢ **Refresh Token**: To renew access tokens
â€¢ **Request Protection**: All requests (except registration and login) require authentication

#### Permission Verification:
â€¢ **System-level Permissions**: Based on user type
â€¢ **Object-level Permissions**: Access to personal data only
â€¢ **Special Permissions**: Doctors can access patient profiles

### 7. Data Validation

#### Phone Number Validation:
â€¢ **Length**: Must be exactly 11 digits
â€¢ **Egyptian Numbers Only**: Supports local and international Egyptian numbers
â€¢ **Valid Prefixes**: Validates number prefix correctness

#### Appointment Validation:
â€¢ **Availability**: Checks doctor availability at specified time
â€¢ **Date**: Ensures appointment date is in the future
â€¢ **Duplication**: Prevents double booking at same time

### 8. API Features

#### RESTful API:
â€¢ **Standard Methods**: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
â€¢ **Unified Responses**: Consistent JSON format
â€¢ **Status Codes**: Standard HTTP status codes

#### Pagination & Filtering:
â€¢ **Pagination**: Support for long lists
â€¢ **Filtering**: Filter by specialization, date, status
â€¢ **Search**: Ability to search through data

### 9. Frontend Integration

#### CORS Support:
â€¢ **Angular Support**: CORS settings customized for frontend
â€¢ **Cross-Origin Requests**: Support for requests from different domains
â€¢ **Security**: Production-ready security settings

#### Enhanced Responses:
â€¢ **Data Formatting**: Format suitable for frontend
â€¢ **Related Data**: Include related data in responses
â€¢ **Clear Errors**: Clear and helpful error messages

### 10. Production Settings

#### Security:
â€¢ **JWT Secrets**: Configurable secret keys
â€¢ **CORS**: Security settings for cross-origin requests
â€¢ **CSRF**: Protection against CSRF attacks

#### Performance:
â€¢ **Database**: PostgreSQL support for production
â€¢ **Static Files**: Static and media file management
â€¢ **Caching**: Caching settings

#### Deployment:
â€¢ **Environment Variables**: Configurable settings
â€¢ **Docker**: Docker container support
â€¢ **CI/CD**: Continuous integration/deployment support

## ğŸ“‹ Key API Endpoints Summary

#### Authentication:
â€¢ `POST /auth/register/` - User registration
â€¢ `POST /auth/login/` - User login
â€¢ `POST /auth/token/refresh/` - Token refresh
â€¢ `GET /users/me/` - Current user data

#### Doctors:
â€¢ `GET /doctors/` - List all doctors
â€¢ `GET /doctors/{id}/` - Doctor details
â€¢ `POST /doctors/schedule/create/` - Create new schedule
â€¢ `PUT /doctors/schedule/{id}/` - Update schedule
â€¢ `GET /doctors/{id}/schedules/` - Get doctor schedules
â€¢ `GET /doctors/available/` - Available doctors

#### Patients:
â€¢ `GET /patients/me/` - Patient profile
â€¢ `PUT /patients/me/` - Update profile
â€¢ `GET /patients/{id}/` - Specific patient (doctors/admin)

#### Appointments:
â€¢ `GET /appointments/` - List appointments
â€¢ `POST /appointments/create/` - Create appointment
â€¢ `GET /appointments/{id}/` - Appointment details
â€¢ `PUT /appointments/{id}/` - Update appointment

#### Clinics:
â€¢ `GET /clinics/` - List all active clinics (public access)
â€¢ `POST /clinics/create/` - Create new clinic (public access)
â€¢ `GET /admin/clinics/` - All clinics (admin only)
â€¢ `POST /admin/clinics/` - Add clinic (admin only)

#### Admin:
â€¢ `GET /admin/users/` - All users
â€¢ `GET /admin/clinics/` - All clinics
â€¢ `POST /admin/clinics/` - Add clinic

## ğŸ” Authentication

All routes are protected by JWT authentication and role-based authorization.

## ğŸ’¡ Usage Instructions

1. **Start by registering a user or logging in**
2. **Use the returned JWT token in Authorization header**: `Bearer {{access_token}}`
3. **Access role-specific endpoints based on user type**
4. **Test all endpoints with different user roles**
5. **Verify permission restrictions work correctly**

## ğŸ§ª Testing Guidelines

â€¢ **Use provided environment variables** for tokens and IDs
â€¢ **Test all endpoints with different user roles**
â€¢ **Verify permission restrictions** work correctly
â€¢ **Test error scenarios** and validation
â€¢ **Use sample data** for comprehensive testing

## ğŸ“ Support

For any questions or issues, please contact the development team.

## ğŸ”— Base URL

Production: `https://your-domain.com/api/`
Development: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/`

item.name: ğŸ” Authentication
item.description:
Authentication and user management endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints handle user registration, login, token refresh, and profile management.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ User registration with role selection (patient/doctor)
â€¢ JWT-based authentication
â€¢ Token refresh mechanism
â€¢ User profile retrieval

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Registration requires Egyptian phone number (11 digits)
â€¢ Passwords must meet security requirements
â€¢ User types determine access permissions

item.name: Register User
item.description:
ğŸ“ Register a new user in the Smart Clinic system

This endpoint allows new users to register as either patients or doctors.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Required Fields:
â€¢ username: Unique username for login
â€¢ email: Valid email address
â€¢ password: Secure password
â€¢ password2: Password confirmation
â€¢ first_name: User's first name
â€¢ last_name: User's last name
â€¢ user_type: 'patient' or 'doctor'
â€¢ phone: Egyptian phone number (11 digits)
â€¢ address: User's address
â€¢ date_of_birth: Birth date (YYYY-MM-DD)
â€¢ gender: 'M' for male, 'F' for female

âœ… Validation:
â€¢ Phone number must be exactly 11 digits (Egyptian format)
â€¢ Passwords must match
â€¢ Email must be unique
â€¢ Username must be unique

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Password is hashed before storage
â€¢ User is automatically logged in after registration
â€¢ JWT tokens are returned for immediate access

item.name: Login
item.description:
ğŸ”‘ Authenticate user and get JWT tokens

This endpoint authenticates users and returns access and refresh tokens for API access.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Required Fields:
â€¢ username: User's username or email
â€¢ password: User's password

âœ… Response:
â€¢ access_token: JWT token for API authentication
â€¢ refresh_token: Token for refreshing access token
â€¢ user: User profile information

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Tokens are automatically stored in environment variables
â€¢ Access token expires in 5 minutes
â€¢ Refresh token expires in 1 day

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Use access_token in Authorization header: 'Bearer {{access_token}}'
â€¢ Use refresh_token to get new access token when expired

item.name: Refresh Token
item.description:
ğŸ”„ Refresh expired access token

This endpoint allows users to get a new access token using their refresh token.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (requires valid refresh token)

ğŸ“‹ Required Fields:
â€¢ refresh: Valid refresh token

âœ… Response:
â€¢ access: New JWT access token

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ New access token expires in 5 minutes
â€¢ Refresh token remains valid
â€¢ Old access token becomes invalid

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Call this endpoint when access token expires (401 error)
â€¢ Update environment variable with new access token

item.name: Get User Profile
item.description:
ğŸ‘¤ Get current user's profile information

This endpoint returns the authenticated user's complete profile data.

ğŸ¯ Access: Authenticated users only

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

âœ… Response:
â€¢ User profile with all details
â€¢ Role-specific information (patient/doctor/admin)
â€¢ Associated profile data

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only returns current user's data
â€¢ Requires valid JWT token

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Use to verify user authentication
â€¢ Get user role and permissions
â€¢ Retrieve profile for display/editing

item.name: ğŸ‘¨â€âš•ï¸ Doctors
item.description:
Doctor management and schedule endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints handle doctor profiles, schedules, availability, and specializations.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ List all doctors with filtering
â€¢ Get doctor details and schedules
â€¢ Create new doctor schedules
â€¢ Update doctor schedules
â€¢ Check doctor availability
â€¢ Filter by specialization

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Schedule creation and updates require doctor authentication
â€¢ Availability is checked in real-time
â€¢ Specialization filtering supports multiple criteria
â€¢ Each doctor can have only one schedule per day

item.name: Get All Doctors
item.description:
ğŸ“‹ Retrieve list of all available doctors

This endpoint returns all doctors in the system with optional filtering by specialization.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Query Parameters:
â€¢ specialization (optional): Filter by medical specialization

âœ… Response:
â€¢ List of all doctors
â€¢ Basic doctor information
â€¢ Specialization and clinic details
â€¢ Availability status

ğŸ” Filtering:
â€¢ Use ?specialization=Cardiology for specific fields
â€¢ Multiple specializations supported
â€¢ Case-insensitive search

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Use for doctor selection in appointment booking
â€¢ Filter by specialization for targeted search
â€¢ Check availability before booking

item.name: Get Doctor Details
item.description:
ğŸ‘¨â€âš•ï¸ Get detailed information about a specific doctor

This endpoint returns comprehensive information about a doctor including their schedule, clinic, and contact details.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ id: Doctor's unique identifier

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete doctor profile
â€¢ Schedule information
â€¢ Clinic details
â€¢ Contact information
â€¢ Specialization details

ğŸ” Information Included:
â€¢ Personal and professional details
â€¢ Working hours and availability
â€¢ Clinic location and contact
â€¢ License and qualifications

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Display doctor profile to patients
â€¢ Show schedule for appointment booking
â€¢ Verify doctor credentials

item.name: Update Doctor Schedule
item.description:
ğŸ“… Update doctor's working schedule

This endpoint allows doctors to modify their working hours and availability.

ğŸ¯ Access: Doctor only (owner of the schedule)

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{doctor_access_token}}

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ schedule_id: Schedule entry identifier

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ day: Day of week (Monday, Tuesday, etc.)
â€¢ start_time: Start time (HH:MM format)
â€¢ end_time: End time (HH:MM format)
â€¢ is_available: Boolean availability status

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Updated schedule information
â€¢ Confirmation of changes

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only schedule owner can update
â€¢ Validates time conflicts
â€¢ Ensures logical time ranges

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Modify working hours
â€¢ Set availability status
â€¢ Update specific days
â€¢ Handle emergency closures

item.name: Create Doctor Schedule
item.description:
â• Create a new schedule entry for a doctor

This endpoint allows doctors to add new schedule entries for their working hours.

ğŸ¯ Access: Doctor only (authenticated doctor)

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{doctor_access_token}}
â€¢ Content-Type: application/json

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ day: Day of week (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday)
â€¢ start_time: Start time (HH:MM format, 24-hour)
â€¢ end_time: End time (HH:MM format, 24-hour)
â€¢ is_available: Boolean availability status (true/false)

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Created schedule information
â€¢ Schedule ID
â€¢ Confirmation of creation

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only authenticated doctors can create schedules
â€¢ Schedule is automatically linked to authenticated doctor
â€¢ Prevents duplicate schedules for same day
â€¢ Validates time ranges

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Add new working days
â€¢ Set initial schedule
â€¢ Expand availability
â€¢ Configure working hours

âš ï¸ Validation:
â€¢ Each doctor can have only one schedule per day
â€¢ End time must be after start time
â€¢ Time format must be HH:MM (24-hour)
â€¢ Day must be valid weekday name

item.name: Get Available Doctors
item.description:
ğŸ” Find doctors available at specific date and time

This endpoint helps patients find doctors who are available for appointments at a given time.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Query Parameters:
â€¢ date (optional): Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD)
â€¢ time (optional): Appointment time (HH:MM)

âœ… Response:
â€¢ List of available doctors
â€¢ Filtered by date/time availability
â€¢ Excludes already booked slots

ğŸ” Filtering Logic:
â€¢ Checks doctor schedules
â€¢ Excludes existing appointments
â€¢ Considers working hours
â€¢ Validates availability status

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Search for available doctors
â€¢ Check specific time slots
â€¢ Plan appointment booking
â€¢ Verify doctor availability

item.name: Get Doctor Schedules
item.description:
ğŸ“… Retrieve all schedules for a specific doctor

This endpoint returns the complete schedule information for a doctor including all working days and times.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ doctor_id: Doctor's unique identifier

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete schedule list
â€¢ Day-wise availability
â€¢ Time slots and status
â€¢ Working hours details

ğŸ” Schedule Information:
â€¢ All days of the week
â€¢ Start and end times
â€¢ Availability status
â€¢ Schedule conflicts

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Display doctor's full schedule
â€¢ Check working hours
â€¢ Plan appointments
â€¢ Verify availability patterns

item.name: ğŸ‘¥ Patients
item.description:
Patient management and profile endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints handle patient profiles, medical history, and profile updates.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ Get patient profile (own or by ID)
â€¢ Update patient information
â€¢ View medical history
â€¢ Emergency contact management
â€¢ Profile access control

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Patients can only access their own profile
â€¢ Doctors and admins can access any patient profile
â€¢ Medical history is protected and confidential

item.name: Get Patient Profile
item.description:
ğŸ‘¤ Get current patient's profile information

This endpoint returns the authenticated patient's complete profile including medical history.

ğŸ¯ Access: Patient (own profile), Doctor/Admin (any patient)

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

ğŸ“‹ Query Parameters (for doctors/admins):
â€¢ patient_id (optional): Specific patient ID to retrieve

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete patient profile
â€¢ Medical history
â€¢ Emergency contacts
â€¢ Personal information

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Patients see only their own profile
â€¢ Doctors/Admins can access any patient
â€¢ Medical data is protected

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Display patient information
â€¢ Access medical history
â€¢ Update profile data
â€¢ Emergency contact lookup

item.name: Update Patient Profile
item.description:
âœï¸ Update patient's profile information

This endpoint allows patients to modify their personal and medical information.

ğŸ¯ Access: Patient only (own profile)

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{patient_access_token}}
â€¢ Content-Type: application/json

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ first_name: Patient's first name
â€¢ last_name: Patient's last name
â€¢ phone: Egyptian phone number (11 digits)
â€¢ address: Current address
â€¢ date_of_birth: Birth date
â€¢ gender: Gender (M/F)
â€¢ medical_history: Medical background
â€¢ emergency_contact: Emergency contact number

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Updated patient profile
â€¢ Confirmation of changes

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only profile owner can update
â€¢ Phone number validation
â€¢ Data integrity checks

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Update personal information
â€¢ Modify medical history
â€¢ Change contact details
â€¢ Update emergency contacts

item.name: Get Patient Detail (Doctor/Admin)
item.description:
ğŸ‘¥ Get specific patient profile (for doctors and admins)

This endpoint allows doctors and admins to retrieve detailed information about any patient.

ğŸ¯ Access: Doctor/Admin only

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{doctor_access_token}} or {{admin_access_token}}

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ id: Patient's unique identifier

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete patient profile
â€¢ Medical history
â€¢ Emergency contacts
â€¢ Appointment history

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only doctors and admins can access
â€¢ Full patient information
â€¢ Confidential medical data

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Doctor consultation preparation
â€¢ Admin patient management
â€¢ Medical record review
â€¢ Emergency contact access

item.name: ğŸ¥ Clinics
item.description:
Clinic management and access endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints handle clinic information, public access, and administrative management.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ Public access to active clinics
â€¢ Clinic information and details
â€¢ Administrative clinic management
â€¢ Location and contact information

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Public endpoints require no authentication
â€¢ Admin endpoints require admin access
â€¢ Only active clinics are publicly visible
â€¢ Full clinic management for administrators

item.name: Get All Active Clinics (Public)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Retrieve all active clinics (public access)

This endpoint returns all active clinics in the system. Anyone can access this endpoint without authentication.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

âœ… Response:
â€¢ List of all active clinics
â€¢ Clinic details and contact info
â€¢ Location information
â€¢ Operating status

ğŸ” Information Included:
â€¢ Clinic name and description
â€¢ Address and contact details
â€¢ Phone and email
â€¢ Active status
â€¢ Creation and update dates

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Browse available clinics
â€¢ Doctor registration selection
â€¢ Public clinic directory
â€¢ Location-based search

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ No authentication required
â€¢ Only active clinics shown
â€¢ Public information only

item.name: Create Clinic (Public)
item.description:
â• Create a new clinic (public access for doctor registration)

This endpoint allows anyone to create a new clinic, typically used during doctor registration.

ğŸ¯ Access: Public (no authentication required)

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ name: Clinic name
â€¢ address: Physical address
â€¢ phone: Egyptian phone number (11 digits)
â€¢ email: Contact email
â€¢ description: Clinic description (optional)

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Created clinic details
â€¢ Confirmation message
â€¢ Clinic ID

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ No authentication required
â€¢ Data validation
â€¢ Phone number verification

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Doctor registration process
â€¢ New clinic registration
â€¢ System expansion
â€¢ Public clinic addition

item.name: ğŸ“… Appointments
item.description:
Appointment management endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints handle appointment booking, viewing, and status updates.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ Book new appointments (patients only)
â€¢ View appointments by role
â€¢ Update appointment status
â€¢ Check appointment details
â€¢ Role-based access control

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Only patients can create appointments
â€¢ Doctors can update appointment status
â€¢ Admins have full access to all appointments

item.name: Create Appointment
item.description:
ğŸ“ Book a new appointment with a doctor

This endpoint allows patients to schedule appointments with available doctors.

ğŸ¯ Access: Patient only

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{patient_access_token}}
â€¢ Content-Type: application/json

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ doctor: Doctor's ID
â€¢ appointment_date: Date (YYYY-MM-DD)
â€¢ appointment_time: Time (HH:MM)
â€¢ reason: Reason for visit
â€¢ description: Additional details

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Created appointment details
â€¢ Confirmation message
â€¢ Appointment ID

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only patients can create appointments
â€¢ Validates doctor availability
â€¢ Checks for time conflicts
â€¢ Ensures valid date/time

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Schedule medical consultations
â€¢ Book follow-up appointments
â€¢ Emergency appointments
â€¢ Regular check-ups

item.name: Get Appointments
item.description:
ğŸ“‹ Retrieve appointments based on user role

This endpoint returns appointments according to the user's role and permissions.

ğŸ¯ Access: Authenticated users (role-based)

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

âœ… Response by Role:
â€¢ Patient: Own appointments only
â€¢ Doctor: Own appointments only
â€¢ Admin: All appointments

ğŸ” Information Included:
â€¢ Appointment details
â€¢ Patient and doctor info
â€¢ Date and time
â€¢ Status and reason

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Role-based filtering
â€¢ Patient sees only their appointments
â€¢ Doctor sees only their appointments
â€¢ Admin sees all appointments

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ View upcoming appointments
â€¢ Check appointment history
â€¢ Manage daily schedule
â€¢ Track appointment status

item.name: Get Appointment Detail
item.description:
ğŸ” Get detailed information about a specific appointment

This endpoint returns comprehensive details about an appointment including patient and doctor information.

ğŸ¯ Access: Appointment owner, assigned doctor, or admin

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ id: Appointment's unique identifier

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete appointment details
â€¢ Patient information
â€¢ Doctor information
â€¢ Status and notes
â€¢ Date and time details

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Patient can see their own appointments
â€¢ Doctor can see assigned appointments
â€¢ Admin can see all appointments

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Review appointment details
â€¢ Prepare for consultation
â€¢ Update appointment status
â€¢ Access patient information

item.name: Update Appointment Status
item.description:
âœï¸ Update appointment status and notes

This endpoint allows doctors and admins to update appointment status and add notes.

ğŸ¯ Access: Assigned doctor or admin

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{doctor_access_token}} or {{admin_access_token}}
â€¢ Content-Type: application/json

ğŸ“‹ Path Parameters:
â€¢ id: Appointment's unique identifier

ğŸ“‹ Body Fields:
â€¢ status: New status (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
â€¢ notes: Doctor's notes

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Updated appointment details
â€¢ Confirmation of changes

ğŸ”’ Security:
â€¢ Only assigned doctor or admin can update
â€¢ Status validation
â€¢ Audit trail maintained

ğŸ’¡ Usage:
â€¢ Confirm appointments
â€¢ Add consultation notes
â€¢ Cancel appointments
â€¢ Mark as completed

item.name: ğŸ¥ Admin Panel
item.description:
Administrative endpoints for the Smart Clinic platform.

These endpoints provide full system management capabilities for administrators.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:
â€¢ User management (view all users)
â€¢ Clinic management (CRUD operations)
â€¢ System-wide appointment access
â€¢ Administrative oversight
â€¢ Full platform control

ğŸ“ Notes:
â€¢ Admin access required for all endpoints
â€¢ Full CRUD operations on clinics
â€¢ Complete user visibility
â€¢ System-wide appointment management

item.name: Get All Users
item.description:
ğŸ‘¥ Retrieve all users in the system

This endpoint returns a complete list of all users including patients, doctors, and admins.

ğŸ¯ Access: Admin only

ğŸ“‹ Headers Required:
â€¢ Authorization: Bearer {{admin_access_token}}

âœ… Response:
â€¢ Complete user list
â€¢ User types and roles
â€¢ Profile information
